## Metadata type

Metadata definition for a given resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Metadata = {
    FIELD?: MetadataDetail[];
    INDEXES?: IndexDetail[];
    REPLY_FIELD?: MetadataDetail[];
    REQUEST_FIELD?: MetadataDetail[];
    NAME?: string;
    TYPE?: string;
    ERROR?: string;
};
```
